titles.title: Hymn 11 - Are We Never Weary Of The Old Song
Hymn 11

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are never never weary of the grand
Old song;
Glory to God Hallelujah!
We can sing it loud as ever, with our
Faith more strong
Glory to God Hallelujah!

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Oh the children of the Lord have the
Right to shout and sing
For the way is growing bright, and
Our souls are on the wings;
We are going by and by to the palace
Of the King:
Glory to God Hallelujah

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
We are going to a place that is built
Of gold;
Glory to God Hallelujah!
Where the King in all His splendour
We shall soon behold
Glory to God Hallelujah!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There we'll shout redeeming mercy
In a glad new song,
Glory to God Hallelujah!
There we'll sing the praise of Jesus
With the blood washed throng
Glory to God Hallelujah!
